doc:
Leonard Jackson (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leonard_Jackson_(actor) 0 Leonard Jackson (February 7, 1928 – December 22, 2013) was an African American stage, film, and television actor, perhaps most widely known for his roles in several PBS television series for children as well as his roles in films such as The Brother from Another Planet, Car Wash, and The Color Purple. Leonard_Jackson ( February_7_,_1928 – December_22_,_2013 ) was an_African_American_stage , film , and television_actor , perhaps_most_widely_known for his_roles in several_PBS_television_series for children as_well as his_roles in films such_as The_Brother from Another_Planet , Car_Wash , and The_Color_Purple .
